description.zh-cn: 中国大陆一家以提供互联网服务为主的综合企业集团，服务范围包括B2B贸易、网上零售、购物搜索引擎、第三方支付和云计算服务。实行位于杭州、上海与北京的双总部制度。
description.en: A Chinese multinational conglomerate holding company specializing in e-commerce, retail, Internet, and technology. It provides B2B trade, online retail, shopping search engines, third-party payment, and cloud computing services. It operates a dual headquarters system in Hangzhou, Shanghai, and Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，阿里巴巴集团的主要创始人，曾任董事局主席。
description.en: A Chinese business magnate, investor, and philanthropist. He is the co-founder and former executive chairman of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团的创始人之一，现任董事局主席。
description.en: A co-founder of Alibaba Group and its current Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团的创始人之一，现任首席执行官（CEO）。
description.en: A co-founder of Alibaba Group and its current Chief Executive Officer (CEO).

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，2019年至2023年期间担任阿里巴巴集团董事局主席兼首席执行官。
description.en: A Chinese business executive who served as the executive chairman and CEO of Alibaba Group from 2019 to 2023.

description.zh-cn: 日本跨国综合企业控股公司，是阿里巴巴集团的早期及主要投资者之一。
description.en: A Japanese multinational conglomerate holding company that was an early and major investor in Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 美国互联网公司，曾是阿里巴巴集团的重要股东。
description.en: An American web services provider that was a significant shareholder in Alibaba Group.

zh-cn: 浙江蚂蚁小微金融服务集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 源于2004年成立的支付宝，是一家中国的金融科技公司，为阿里巴巴集团的关联公司。
description.en: Originating from Alipay which was founded in 2004, it is a Chinese fintech company and an affiliate of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团旗下的中国网上购物平台。
description.en: A Chinese online shopping platform under Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 原名淘宝商城，是从淘宝网分拆出来的B2C平台。
description.en: Formerly Taobao Mall, it is a B2C platform spun off from Taobao.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团旗下的云计算公司。
description.en: The cloud computing subsidiary of Alibaba Group.

zh-cn: 菜鸟网络科技有限公司

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团旗下的物流公司。
description.en: The logistics arm of Alibaba Group.

nodes.id: 国家市场监督管理总局

zh-cn: 国家市场监督管理总局

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管市场监督管理和综合执法的直属机构。
description.en: A direct agency under the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for market supervision and comprehensive law enforcement.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: The current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海的证券交易所。
description.en: A stock exchange based in the city of Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 香港的证券交易所。
description.en: The stock exchange of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的证券交易所。
description.en: An American stock exchange in New York City.

description.zh-cn: 中国的影片分享网站，现为阿里巴巴集团旗下子公司。
description.en: A video hosting service in China, now a subsidiary of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国的导航电子地图内容和位置服务解决方案提供商，现为阿里巴巴集团旗下子公司。
description.en: A Chinese provider of digital map content and location-based solutions, now a subsidiary of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国的在线外卖订餐平台，现为阿里巴巴集团旗下子公司。
description.en: A Chinese online food delivery platform, now a subsidiary of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚的电子商务平台，为阿里巴巴集团的子公司。
description.en: A Southeast Asian e-commerce platform, a subsidiary of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 香港的英文报纸，自2015年起为阿里巴巴集团所拥有。
description.en: A Hong Kong English-language newspaper owned by Alibaba Group since 2015.

description.zh-cn: 指一种“早上9点上班，晚上9点下班，每周工作6天”的工作制度，在中国大陆引发广泛争议。
description.en: Refers to a work schedule of '9 am to 9 pm, 6 days a week', which has sparked widespread controversy in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 马云是阿里巴巴集团的主要创始人之一，被称为“十八罗汉”之首。
description.en: Jack Ma is one of the main co-founders of Alibaba Group, leading the '18 Arhats'.

description.zh-cn: 蔡崇信是阿里巴巴集团的创始人之一。
description.en: Joseph Tsai is one of the co-founders of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 吴泳铭是阿里巴巴集团的创始人之一。
description.en: Eddie Wu is one of the co-founders of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 吴泳铭于2023年9月正式履新阿里巴巴集团首席执行官。
description.en: Eddie Wu formally took office as the CEO of Alibaba Group in September 2023.

description.zh-cn: 蔡崇信于2023年9月正式履新阿里巴巴集团董事局主席。
description.en: Joseph Tsai formally took office as the Chairman of the Board of Alibaba Group in September 2023.

description.zh-cn: 张勇接替马云担任阿里巴巴集团董事局主席。
description.en: Daniel Zhang succeeded Jack Ma as the Chairman of the Board of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 马云于2019年9月10日卸任阿里巴巴集团董事局主席职务。
description.en: Jack Ma stepped down as the Chairman of the Board of Alibaba Group on September 10, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 软银集团是阿里巴巴集团的早期主要投资者和长期大股东。
description.en: SoftBank Group is an early major investor and long-term large shareholder of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，雅虎通过收购雅虎中国资产获得阿里巴巴集团40%的股份。2012年，阿里巴巴回购了其中一半的股份。
description.en: In 2005, Yahoo acquired a 40% stake in Alibaba Group through the acquisition of Yahoo China's assets. In 2012, Alibaba repurchased half of that stake.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团于2003年5月投资1亿元人民币建立网上购物平台淘宝网。
description.en: Alibaba Group invested 100 million RMB in May 2003 to establish the online shopping platform Taobao.

description.zh-cn: 2011年6月，阿里巴巴集团将淘宝网分拆为三个独立公司，其中包括淘宝商城，后更名为天猫。
description.en: In June 2011, Alibaba Group split Taobao into three independent companies, including Taobao Mall, which was later renamed Tmall.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团于2013年3月宣布筹备成立阿里小微金融服务集团，后更名为蚂蚁集团。
description.en: Alibaba Group announced in March 2013 the preparation for the establishment of Ali Small and Micro Financial Services Group, which was later renamed Ant Group.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团于2009年9月成立子公司阿里云计算。
description.en: Alibaba Group established its subsidiary Alibaba Cloud Computing in September 2009.

description.zh-cn: 菜鸟网络于2013年由阿里巴巴集团牵头成立。
description.en: Cainiao Network was founded in 2013, led by Alibaba Group.

relationships.source: 国家市场监督管理总局

description.zh-cn: 因实施“二选一”等涉嫌垄断行为，国家市场监管总局对阿里巴巴集团进行立案调查，并于2021年4月处以182.28亿元人民币罚款。整改工作于2024年8月宣布完成。
description.en: Due to monopolistic behaviors such as 'choose one of two', the State Administration for Market Regulation launched an investigation into Alibaba Group, and imposed a fine of 18.228 billion RMB in April 2021. The rectification was announced as complete in August 2024.

description.zh-cn: 据《华尔街日报》报道，中共中央总书记习近平亲自下令阻止蚂蚁集团的首次公开募股。
description.en: According to The Wall Street Journal, CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping personally ordered the suspension of Ant Group's IPO.

description.zh-cn: 上海证券交易所发布决定，暂缓蚂蚁集团在科创板的上市。
description.en: The Shanghai Stock Exchange issued a decision to suspend Ant Group's listing on the STAR Market.

description.zh-cn: 香港交易所发表声明，暂缓蚂蚁集团H股上市。
description.en: The Hong Kong Stock Exchange issued a statement to suspend the H-share listing of Ant Group.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团于2014年9月19日在纽约证券交易所挂牌上市。
description.en: Alibaba Group was listed on the New York Stock Exchange on September 19, 2014.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团于2019年11月26日在香港交易所二次上市，并于2024年8月转为双重主要上市。
description.en: Alibaba Group completed a secondary listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on November 26, 2019, and converted to a dual primary listing in August 2024.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团全资收购合一集团（原优酷土豆集团）。此前已于2014年4月入股。
description.en: Alibaba Group fully acquired HeYi Group (formerly Youku Tudou Group). It had previously invested in the company in April 2014.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团全面收购高德软件并将其私有化。此前已于2013年5月入股。
description.en: Alibaba Group fully acquired AutoNavi (Gaode Software) and privatized it. It had previously invested in the company in May 2013.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴联合蚂蚁金服以95亿美元全资收购饿了么。
description.en: Alibaba, together with Ant Financial, fully acquired Ele.me for US$9.5 billion.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团于2016年入股Lazada成为最大股东，并于2017年增持股份至83%。
description.en: Alibaba Group invested in Lazada in 2016 to become its largest shareholder and increased its stake to 83% in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团收购南华早报集团的媒体资产。
description.en: Alibaba Group acquired the media assets of the South China Morning Post Group.

description.zh-cn: 马云在公司内部交流中发表言论，称能做996是一种“福报”，公开支持996工作制，引发舆论争议。
description.en: In an internal company meeting, Jack Ma made remarks supporting the 996 working hour system, calling it a 'blessing', which sparked public controversy.
